title: Pursuit
description: Jude Emerson would never admit his love for Jenny Sunshine until he lost her to another man. Lori London’s world crumbled when her husband was killed in combat, leaving her pregnant and alone.Time has passed but hearts haven’t healed.Obsession drives Jude.Desperation leads Lori into a life she never would have considered.When their paths cross, broken souls slowly begin to mend.But can the ghosts of their pasts stay away long enough for love to be born?Or will they be destined to a life of hurt, and loneliness?This is book two in the Vegas Girl's series.***WARNING*** This book contains sexual content that may not be suitable for some.Sexual abuse is a taboo topic covered.FMF threesome, and various sexual exploits.
author: Dawn  Robertson
